Here's a suggested investment breakdown for your $100,000 portfolio based on the specified allocations:

### 1. **Stocks (50% - $50,000)**
   - **Top Performers**:
     - **Nvidia (NVDA)**: Gained 167.5% recently. [More Info](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/top-performing-stocks-2023)
     - **Palantir (PLTR)**: Another strong performer. [More Info](https://www.morningstar.com/stocks/top-performing-stocks-2023)
   - **Growth Stocks**:
     - **Meta Platforms (META)**: A leading company in interactive media. [More Info](https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/types-of-stocks/growth-stocks/)
     - **Salesforce (CRM)**: A major player in software solutions. [More Info](https://www.fool.com/investing/stock-market/types-of-stocks/growth-stocks/)

### 2. **Bonds (30% - $30,000)**
   - **Bond ETFs**:
     - **Vanguard Ultra-Short Bond ETF (VUSB)**: A solid choice for stability. [More Info](https://money.usnews.com/investing/articles/best-bond-etfs-to-buy-now)
     - **DoubleLine Commercial Real Estate ETF (DCRE)**: Focuses on commercial real estate. [More Info](https://money.usnews.com/investing/articles/best-bond-etfs-to-buy-now)
   - **Best Bond Funds**:
     - **American Funds Bond Fund of America (ABNFX)**: A reputable bond fund. [More Info](https://www.morningstar.com/funds/best-bond-funds)

### 3. **Cryptocurrency (10% - $10,000)**
   - **Top Cryptos**:
     - **Bitcoin (BTC)**: The leading cryptocurrency. [More Info](https://www.forbes.com/advisor/investing/cryptocurrency/top-10-cryptocurrencies/)
     - **Ethereum (ETH)**: A strong contender in the crypto space. [More Info](https://www.forbes.com/advisor/investing/cryptocurrency/top-10-cryptocurrencies/)
     - **Binance Coin (BNB)**: Popular among crypto investors. [More Info](https://www.forbes.com/advisor/investing/cryptocurrency/top-10-cryptocurrencies/)

### 4. **ETFs (10% - $10,000)**
   - Consider investing in a diversified ETF that tracks a broad market index, such as:
     - **SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY)**: A popular choice for exposure to the S&P 500.
     - **Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF (VTI)**: Offers exposure to the entire U.S. stock market.

This portfolio provides a balanced approach, combining growth potential with stability. Always consider consulting with a financial advisor to tailor the investments to your specific risk tolerance and financial goals.
